feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: return empty array if no transcription found by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15185
  • fix: styles for the schedule component, make it mobile-friendly by @helgastogova in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15178
  • fix(atoms): fix max-height bug for the Booker component by @helgastogova in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15195
  • fix: attendeeSeatId is not being returned on webhook response for events with seats by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15184
  • fix: Profile page crash due to invalid topLevelElement by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15198
  • chore: added event-types link to settings by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14274
  • fix: platform booker icons and address property for type inPerson by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15207
  • fix: Event Type Toggle Shift by @Sujitale07 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15066
  • fix: event duration missing translation by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14862
  • feat: autosave availability after making changes by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14849
  • fix: avatar on booking page by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15190
  • fix: platform plan name is always uppercase by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15215
  • fix: exclude atoms web wrappers from build by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15216
  • chore: Platform Booker defaultFormValues for prefilling by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15219
  • feat: Add {first name} variable to Organizer & Scheduler custom eventâ€¦ by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14156
  • feat: jelly seamless signup by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15220
  • chore: v4.1.5 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15230

New Contributors

  • @helgastogova made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15178
  • @Sujitale07 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15066

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.1.4...v4.1.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.1.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Reducing E2E test sharding by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15192
  • fix: not able to click start recording button when transcription enabled by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15244
  • fix: intercom has organisation by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15224
  • fix: openIntercom="true" opens intercom app by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15235
  • fix: useGetBookingForReschedule wait for calProvider init by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15236
  • fix: double icon on user event type by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15239
  • chore: added help cards to platform dashboard by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15218
  • fix: removing the default app should remove the default badge from the appCard by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15243
  • fix: API booking issues by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15247
  • fix: Do subscription update even if team.members are less than 30 in case orgSeats allow it by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15209
  • fix: missing date overrides in negative tz by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15251
  • test: add default handler tests by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15258
  • chore: version platform libraries npm package by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15257
  • test: get upgradeable test by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15261
  • fix: remove ts-ignore by converting to string[] by @kaleem68 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14622
  • feat: Adds 45 min to dynamic events by @dilpreetsio in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15248
  • feat(i18n): complete Simplified Chinese translations by @stout-ni in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14474
  • chore: Add guest email blacklist by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15255
  • fix: Typing on getAggregateWorkingHours by @viniciusvieira00 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15137
  • fix: top right section overflow for event page by @Afrin127329 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15109
  • fix: Avatars not showing when using bookings filter by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15271
  • refactor: format v2 API managed user timeZone by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15273
  • fix: add blacklist email logic in backend by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15270
  • chore: v4.1.6 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15266

New Contributors

  • @dilpreetsio made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15248
  • @stout-ni made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14474
  • @viniciusvieira00 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15137
  • @Afrin127329 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15109

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.1.5...v4.1.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.1.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: Introduce crmManager by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14272

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.1.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: add redirectUrl to /eventTypes page as well by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15274
  • feat: Add framework to send all events fired for embed to Analytics Apps by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15173
  • fix: Typo in deleteCredential handler by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15281
  • fix: 404 collisions by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15249
  • chore: v4.1.8 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15287

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.1.7...v4.1.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.1.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: ability to assign people to round robin from org members by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14199
  • fix: Kbar component styles and improve transitions by @hichemfantar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15283
  • feat: outlook 365 calendar endpoints by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15077
  • chore: added admin API docs by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15297
  • fix: Double encoding in addAppMutation by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15303
  • fix: no rating submitted text fixed by @smitgol in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15007
  • fix: contributor.md typo by @AbhishekGurav in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15102
  • fix: inviting a team member dosent work when he login in via Google by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/11312
  • fix: typo in Gcal atom prop and outlook service by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15319
  • feat: API v2 subversioning by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15135
  • fix: Booking Error - cannot be booked at this time by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15288
  • feat: track no-shows in bookings by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15307
  • chore: v4.1.9 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15321

New Contributors

  • @smitgol made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15007
  • @AbhishekGurav made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15102

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.1.8...v4.1.9
